short_summary: .PacificHerringSurvey off the BCCoast. Project work anticipated to take place between January and May 2023.
full_summary:
***

### Pacific Herring Survey
#### British Columbia

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017103
**Solicitation Number:** 30003714

**Tender Details:**

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:**
    *   British Columbia
*   **Regions of Delivery:**
    *   British Columbia

**Scope of Work:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites proposals from qualified contractors to conduct a data collection program for Pacific Herring (Clupea pallasi) covering the five major and two minor assessment regions on the British Columbia coast.

**Objectives:**

1.  Measure herring spawn deposition (eggs) through SCUBA dive surveys or surface surveys in some or all (as needed) of the five major stock assessment regions (Haida Gwaii, Prince Rupert District, Central Coast, Strait of Georgia, and the West Coast of Vancouver Island) and two minor regions (Area 27).
2.  Obtain biological samples from pre-spawning aggregations of Pacific Herring using purse seine vessels in some or all (as needed) of the following major stock assessment regions: Haida Gwaii, Prince Rupert District, Central Coast, Strait of Georgia, and the West Coast of Vancouver Island, and minor region Area 2W.

**Contracting Entity:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Contact Information:**

Kimberly Walker

•   Address: 301 Bishop Drive
•   City: Fredericton
•   Province: NB
•   Postal Code: E3C 2M6
•   Country: Canada

**Documents:**

Please download the Request for Proposal documents from [CanadaBuy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

**Tender Deadline:**

*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-11T13:00:00

Note: This tender has expired and is no longer open for new submissions.  wasprobably supposed to invite Contractors to watch out for further government announcements related to this project.
